text: Kirill Borisovich Putyrsky (Russian: Кирилл Борисович Путырский; born 1 October 1928) is a Russian rower who represented the Soviet Union. He competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki with the men's coxed four where they were eliminated in the semi-final repêchage. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of the Soviet Union Category:Rowers at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Saint Petersburg Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Kirill Putyrsky
